about_the_game:
Have you ever wondered what you would do if you were king? Renryuu is an adult fantasy RPG that follows the story of the dragonic Ryen, who, after stumbling upon a plot to place an imposter on the throne, takes the opportunity to seize power himself. His duties and adventures as the new king will take him from the streets of the capital to the far corners of the world.

Renryuu is filled with excitement, danger, and the company of many beautiful women!

The game has several special features:
- Explore an open world environment filled with quests!
- The economic system is varied and multi-faceted.
- Construction projects for your country, like roads, a laboratory, mines and others.
- Game mechanics include skill trees, strategy battles with your army, trading maps, minigames and more.
- Engage in international diplomacy.
- Many hours of gameplay ... and more with every update!

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game contains content not appropriate for all ages.
While there are no visual depictions of sexual activity, there are scenes in the game in which the female characters are showing a relatively high amounts of skin, are shown in suggestive poses, or discuss sexual acts (none of which are depicted).
Some characters involved in sexual content in the game are not human. Other races include catgirls, elves, demons, alraunes (plant-girls), and many other non-human races.

The game contains:
- Strong language
- Sexual language
- Partial nudity 
- Sexual content
- Sexual assault/non-consensual sex
- General mature content
- Mild fantasy violence

- Not suitable for playing at work
- Not suitable for all ages
- All characters in the game that are involved in events with sexual content are over 18 years old

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 ()
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Additional Notes: Not supported: macOS Big Sur 11.0 and later.

name: Renryuu: Ascension

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 / OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
